question: My father is very sick and needs help.....i need a diagnosis because we go to the hospital and do all kinds of tests and they give him a diagnosis and medicine. but after we leave a few days later hes right back the way he was in pain cant sleep, or to tired.his symptoms are: body aches, very tired, sleepy, sore head, chest pains, and hard time sleeping.he also has diabetes and has had an enlarged heart, liver, and testicals...please HELP ME I LOVE HIM AND HE IS VERY SICK!!!!!!!This discussion is related tohttp://www.medhelp.org/posts/show/284923.
title: MY FATHER IS VERY SICK PLEASE HELP!!!!!
